name: Portfolio Website
description: Portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.

name: Polaris
description: 2D game that teaches players about ocean pollution solutions through gameplay mechanics and messaging

name: Canvas Module PDF Downloader
description: A browser extension that can download all PDFs from a Canvas module either individually or as a combined file

name: CSV Manager
description: Module that allows one to read from, write to, and manage a CSV file

name: JPEG Filename Date Stamper
description: Modifies the EXIF data of JPEG files by extracting the date/time from the filename and updating the EXIF tags

name: JPEG Time Mismatch Fixer
description: Fixes the time discrepancy between the photo's time and real time

name: Anchor: Endless Possibilities
description: Created a high school yearbook over the pandemic and served as the Editor-in-Chief and the main photographer
